other_tests.findings: Mild atelectasis in lung bases, mild enlargement of the heart, no pleural or pericardial effusions, mild diffuse atrophy of the pancreas, small hiatal hernia, normal liver, gallbladder, adrenal glands, and spleen, dense atherosclerotic aortic calcifications, multiple tiny retroperitoneal lymph nodes, diffuse wall thickening and extensive fat stranding surrounding a short segment of the sigmoid colon, extensive sigmoid diverticulosis.
